images.prompt: A 4K image of a distant planet in a binary star system, with a bright blue and purple gas giant planet in the foreground, surrounded by a halo of cosmic dust and debris, with a faint orange-red glow of the companion star in the background, set against a deep blue-black night sky with countless stars and nebulae

response.description: A stunning vista of a distant planet in a binary star system, showcasing the breathtaking beauty of space
